XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle codehandin package

TABLE.NAME: codehandin
TABLE.COMMENT: adds additonal codehandin fields to an assignment

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the assignment (references id in mdl_assign) also must be called id to use moodle functions

FIELD.NAME: proglangid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the programming language (a ref to mdl_CodeHandIn _proglang)

FIELD.NAME: mustattemptcompile
FIELD.COMMENT: an option that lets assignments specify that they must attempt a compile/check before they can be submitted

FIELD.NAME: spectest
FIELD.COMMENT: pointer to a specific test file that can be used to replace or in conjunction with checkpoints and tests assessment definition.

FIELD.NAME: spectestruntimeargs
FIELD.COMMENT: arguments for the specific test file for regular testing

FIELD.NAME: spectestaruntimeargs
FIELD.COMMENT: arguments for the specific test file for assessment testing

FIELD.NAME: studentfile
FIELD.COMMENT: pointer to sample test file that students can download

FIELD.NAME: spectestonly
FIELD.COMMENT: allows the use of a specific test file only

FIELD.NAME: funcpercent
FIELD.COMMENT: the mark allocated for the functional part of the assignment (max from testing)

KEY.NAME: assignmentid
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance these codehandin details relate to

KEY.NAME: proglangid
KEY.COMMENT: the language used in this assignment

TABLE.NAME: codehandin_proglang
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the languages the plugin can use

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the programming language automatically assigned

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of the programming language

FIELD.NAME: defaultscript
FIELD.COMMENT: the default script to use the language

TABLE.NAME: codehandin_checkpoint
TABLE.COMMENT: A checkpoint in a programming assignments

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the checkpoint automatically assigned

FIELD.NAME: assignmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the assignment of which the checkpoint belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: the name of the checkpoint

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: a description of the checkpoint (can include hints etc.)

FIELD.NAME: runtimeargs
FIELD.COMMENT: runtime arguments for the checkpoint

FIELD.NAME: ordering
FIELD.COMMENT: an integer that defined the order of the checkpoints for an assignment

FIELD.NAME: marks
FIELD.COMMENT: the marks assigned for this particular checkpoint

TABLE.NAME: codehandin_test
TABLE.COMMENT: A test as part of a checkpoint ... some should be private

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the test automatically assigned

FIELD.NAME: checkpointid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the checkpoint to which the test belongs

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: if the input, output and outputerr fields are text rather than file pointers

FIELD.NAME: description
FIELD.COMMENT: a description of the test (there is no name field)

FIELD.NAME: gradeonly
FIELD.COMMENT: if the test is for assessment only

FIELD.NAME: runtimeargs
FIELD.COMMENT: runtime arguments specific to this test

FIELD.NAME: ioastext
FIELD.COMMENT: if the input, output and outputerr fields are text rather than file pointers

FIELD.NAME: input
FIELD.COMMENT: the input for the test (text or file pointer)

FIELD.NAME: output
FIELD.COMMENT: the output for the test (text or file pointer)

FIELD.NAME: outputerr
FIELD.COMMENT: the outputerr for the test (text or file pointer)

FIELD.NAME: retval
FIELD.COMMENT: the return value of the test

FIELD.NAME: ordering
FIELD.COMMENT: an integer that defined the order of the test for the checkpoint

FIELD.NAME: marks
FIELD.COMMENT: the marks for this specific test (marks are equally divided with any remainder added to the last test)

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: the id of the submission (references id in mdl_assignment_submission)

FIELD.NAME: auto_grade
FIELD.COMMENT: the grade from the automatic assessment

FIELD.NAME: style_grade
FIELD.COMMENT: the grade for style supplied by the teacher

FIELD.NAME: compiles
FIELD.COMMENT: if the project compiles

FIELD.NAME: runcommand
FIELD.COMMENT: The actual command to be run. $file will insert the user's file name into the string.

FIELD.NAME: compilecommand
FIELD.COMMENT: The command to compile the users files.

FIELD.NAME: removeextension
FIELD.COMMENT: Remove the file extension when placing the user's file in the run command.
